name: Hollow (itch) (SpotOnJ2K)
description:
Hollow is a horror-themed Adventure/RPG hybrid with an emphasis on the surreal and unknown.

In Hollow, you are a city detective who has transferred to the nearly abandoned rural town of Hollow where some of the worst criminals have mysteriously escaped. It will be up to you and whoever will help to use everything at your disposal to figure out what has happened. Guns, magic, computer hacking, investigation tools, surreal puzzles, and major decision making will factor into whether or not you will succeed.

Some more info:

The video shown is for an older build (demo version) and doesn't show the lighting and shadows visual option included with this full version of the game.
